results.title: ‘The Bad Guys’ and the Crossroads Its Author Faced
results.abstract: Unable to support his family with his children’s books, Aaron Blabey was ready to give up. Then he came up with the concept that’s now a best seller and an animated movie.

multimedia.caption: Aaron Blabey in Los Angeles: “I’m the epitome of a late bloomer, I guess.”
multimedia.copyright: Alex Welsh for The New York Times

results.title: ‘The Northman’ Wasn’t Easy to Make. But That’s How Robert Eggers Likes It.
results.abstract: The director explains why he sought out such difficult conditions, why he won’t talk with an actor about a character’s back story and why the box office matters.

multimedia.caption: Robert Eggers and his self-described “alpha beard” in Los Angeles this month.

results.title: ‘Rust’ Investigators Release Crime Scene Photos, Await Key Evidence
results.abstract: The criminal investigation of Alec Baldwin’s fatal shooting of a cinematographer on a film set cannot be completed without key ballistics and other evidence, the Santa Fe County sheriff said.
results.byline: By Graham Bowley and Julia Jacobs

multimedia.caption: The Santa Fe County sheriff’s office released photos from its investigation of the fatal shooting of the cinematographer Halyna Hutchins on the set of the film “Rust.”
The Santa Fe County sheriff’s office released photos from its investigation of the fatal shooting of the cinematographer Halyna Hutchins on the set of the film “Rust.”

results.title: For Panah Panahi, Being the Son of an Iranian Auteur Wasn’t Entirely Helpful
results.abstract: He was long paralyzed by the prospect of being compared with Jafar Panahi. But it was his sister who spurred the young director to make his acclaimed new film.

multimedia.caption: Panah Panahi has considered leaving Iran. But “since cinema is my passion and only way of expression, I cannot make films elsewhere.”
Panah Panahi has considered leaving Iran. But “since cinema is my passion and only way of expression, I cannot make films elsewhere.”

results.title: Library of Congress Acquires Neil Simon Papers

results.title: In ‘The Duke,’ Jim Broadbent Puts an Eccentric at the Center
results.abstract: The British actor has spent six decades seeking out carefully observed, often quirky characters. In his latest film, he’s also the lead.

results.title: Jimmy Wang Yu, Seminal Figure in Kung Fu Films, Dies at 79
results.abstract: He changed the nature of Asian martial arts movies, which had been relying on sword fighting and fantasy, by bringing hand-to-hand combat to the fore.

multimedia.caption: The martial arts star Jimmy Wang Yu at the Cannes Film Festival in 2011. His success in the 1960s paved the way for stars like Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan.
The martial arts star Jimmy Wang Yu at the Cannes Film Festival in 2011. His success in the 1960s paved the way for stars like Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan.

results.title: ‘The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent’ Review: Being Nicolas Cage
results.abstract: Nicolas Cage plays Nick Cage — maybe, kind of, not really — in a comically romantic, buddy-movie thriller that is also an ode to him in all his Caginess.
des_facet: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent (Movie)

multimedia.caption: In “The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent,” Nicolas Cage plays a wrung-out actor yearning for a role worthy of his self-regard. This avatar looks and sounds like the real deal.

results.title: ‘Rust’ Producers Get Maximum Fine in Cinematographer’s Death
results.abstract: The production company, which included the actor Alec Baldwin, was fined $136,000 and was criticized for showing indifference to “recognized hazards.”

multimedia.caption: Workplace safety regulators for the state of New Mexico cited the producers of the film “Rust” on Wednesday for failures on the set that they said contributed to the death of a cinematographer who was fatally shot.

Workplace safety regulators for the state of New Mexico cited the producers of the film “Rust” on Wednesday for failures on the set that they said contributed to the death of a cinematographer who was fatally shot.
